definition: see 蝲蛄, fresh-water crayfish (Procambarus clarkii)

sentences.english: Crayfish looks like langostines but isn't as tasty.
sentences.chinese: 蝲蛄長得很像龍蝦，但味道可沒有龍蝦鮮美。

definition: mussels/bivalves grown in rivers and lakes
crab of the family Potamidae of freshwater crabs
small carp (Rhodeus sinensis and other spp.)
giant Amazon snail (Ampullaria gigas spix), that has devastated rice paddies in China since its introduction in the 1980s
oriental river prawn (Macrobrachium nipponense), a species of freshwater shrimp, also called 青蝦|青虾[qing1 xia1]
mole cricket/Gryllolaptaptidae, family of burrowing insects of order Orthoptera (a serious agricultural pest)
small carp (Rhodeus sinensis and other spp.)
Asian swamp eel (Monopterus albus)/CL:個|个[ge4],條|条[tiao2]
